data.message: WHAT THE FUCK IS YOUR PROBLEM MARSHALL? What happened to the rapper who sang white America and way I am? You lowlife sellout un-American piece of shit. I was once one of your biggest fans but now....? WHAT A DIPSHIT.

replies.message: Did u even listen to white America " burn the flag and replace it with a parental advisory sticker"

Yes I have, maybe you missed trump telling everyone tough shit if you don't like him (the way I am) and the corrupt government he's trying to get rid of is representative of what he's against. He's trying to fix the issues everyone has been tired of forever. To be honest I could see those two chilling out with a 40 grabbing pussies together.
